column1: Little Goat Diner////I am a huge brunch person so the fact that they serve breakfast all day already wins my heart to begin with. But on top of that
column2: the food is fresh and downright delicious. I've had the Elvis waffles which is basically a banana + peanut butter (+bacon) paradise. Literally amazing. This past time I went
column3: I tried to get a healthier option so went with the chick pea salad. Ate every bite I could fit in. And the portion was a generous size! This place is def a favorite after only 3 visits.
